1441490.name: DROD: The Second Sky Travelogue Soundtrack
1441490.description:
27 tracks, 108 minutes

This version was mixed for the DROD: The Second Sky video game. These tracks correspond to the music featured in the Badlands, Caldera, and Greenhouse room styles, and more from this game.

Please note: The purchase of this track is for personal use only. Any commercial use of this track must be licensed through Travelogue.

This is a soundtrack to a computer game: DROD: The Second Sky. Some of these songs were also released as vocal versions for other Travelogue albums. Visit Travelogue's site for more information about the music or Caravel Games for more information about the games.

Jon Sonnenberg: all synthesizers and programming
Erik Hermansen: In a Vat, source melody and lyrics
